attributes.action: Government needs to Provide better guidelines to stop violence from Landlords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That they should be more detailed guidelines for Police.They cannot just excuse themselves and claim "its a civil matter" because an incident may involve a Landlord when they receive a 999 call.Guidelines should be made to protect Pregnant women, old people and children etc. ................ i wish to amend this as it was not working do not submit this petition it is a trial only of your e-petition I wish to edit as orignal version too long

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
